label: Skincare Products
description: Products for cleansing, moisturizing, and treating skin concerns.

subcategories.label: Cleansers
subcategories.description: Products for removing dirt, oil, and makeup from the skin.

subcategories.label: Moisturizers
subcategories.description: Products for hydrating and nourishing the skin.

subcategories.label: Treatments
subcategories.description: Products for treating specific skin concerns.

subcategories.label: Masks
subcategories.description: Products for deep-cleaning and treating the skin.

subcategories.label: Exfoliators
subcategories.description: Products for removing dead skin cells and promoting cell turnover.

subcategories.label: Eye Care
subcategories.description: Products for treating and preventing eye area concerns.
